execution_plan.description: Find product_id(s) that appear most frequently in Order_Items (handle ties).
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id AS s1__product_id, COUNT(order_item_id) AS s1__order_count FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(order_item_id) = (SELECT MAX(cnt) FROM (SELECT COUNT(order_item_id) AS cnt FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id) AS sub);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product id, name and price for the most frequently ordered product(s) by joining to Products using the product_id(s) from step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id AS s2__product_id, product_name AS s2__product_name, product_price AS s2__product_price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.s1__product_id);
